About

About

I’m a graphic designer from Los Angeles. Curiosity drives me as a maker and as a thinker, critically engaging with concepts and content to produce meaningful work. I’m very much interested in exploring new tools and technologies and learning to make my own tools, from computer programs to typefaces.
